TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi StackPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo
Public Class StackPanel Inherits Panel Implements IScrollInfo
type StackPanel = class inherit Panel interface IScrollInfo

summary.span: 將子元素排成單一行，以水平或垂直方式排列。

span.span: Arranges child elements into a single line that can be oriented horizontally or vertically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含的集合中的物件屬性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 預設值是針對 stretch並中所包含之內容的。The default value is stretch for both and of content that is contained in a . 面板項目不會接收焦點的預設值。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要有興趣接收焦點的面板項目，設定屬性設`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. 實作介面，以支援邏輯捲動的比較。 implements the interface to support logical scrolling. 邏輯捲動可用來捲動至下一個項目，邏輯樹狀結構中。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree. 這是相較於實體捲動時，它將內容依定義的實體遞增值，以指定的方向捲動。This is in contrast to physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動的比較，包裝主機中的項目並設定其屬性設`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`.

related.span: WPF 控制項陳列庫範例

span.span: WPF Controls Gallery Sample

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 是否能以水平維度捲動。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a can scroll in the horizontal dimension.

value.span: 如果內容能以水平維度捲動，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if content can scroll in the horizontal dimension; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不適用於您的程式碼。This property is not intended to be used in your code. 它會公開介面合約的履行 ()。It is exposed publicly to fulfill an interface contract (). 設定這個屬性沒有任何作用。Setting this property has no effect. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動的比較，包裝中並設定其屬性設`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定如何內的項目堆疊 （在其他或並排顯示上一個）。The following example shows how to use the property to specify how elements within a are stacked (one on top of the other or side by side). [!code-xaml[StackPanel_snip#StackPanelOrientationExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StackPanel_snip/CS/OrientationExample.xaml#stackpanelorientationexamplewholepage)] 以下螢幕擷取畫面顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The screenshot below shows how this example renders. ![StackPanel 的方向](~/add/media/layout-stackpanelorientationexample.gif "StackPanel 的方向")![StackPanel orientation](~/add/media/layout-stackpanelorientationexample.gif "StackPanel orientation")
